provers.name: Tutorial Prover 1
provers.notes: This is a tutorial prover with high priority. The priority system helps organize which provers to service first.

provers.name: Tutorial Prover 2
provers.notes: This prover has medium priority. Different provers can be configured for different fuel types.

provers.name: Tutorial Prover 3
provers.notes: This prover has low priority. The system allows setting preferences for each prover.
